name: auto-task-v4
change: 优化:Gleam.io站出现人机验证是停止验证任务

scripts.build: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && webpack --config webpack.config.js && webpack --config webpack.compatibility.config.js && webpack --config webpack.giveawaysu.config.js && node build-all-static.js && node copy.js && node doc-sync.js && node release.js
